title: OT129: Opaque Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is an Open Thread post, which is part of a bi-weekly series of blog posts.
- The post doesn't have a specific topic, but it mentions the Register of Bans, the San Francisco meetup, and the SSC subreddit and podcast.

Key learnings:
- The Open Thread is a space where people can post about anything, but should avoid controversial topics.
- The Register of Bans is a list of people banned from SSC meetups, and those who are banned will not be allowed to attend in the future.

Key questions:
- There are no key questions posed by the author in this particular post.
